message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial offer. Would you consider $10,500?
